title: Issue to play on BRAZILIAN server
body: I was playing on server BR like 1 week ago , then when i started the next game, i was unable to play , because there was saying Reconect... and i tried with a program called PingZapper and worked , so i just want to now if its my internet or ip or another thing

replies.body: Most of the time if the client throws a reconnect error it means that there is something preventing your network from keeping a stable connection to the game servers. Let's be sure to cover the most common reasons of disconnections by going through the steps in this [**connection guide**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues). Let me know how that helps!
